#!/bin/sh

case "$ACTION" in 
	add)
		/etc/init.d/samba start
		for i in $(ls /dev/ | grep 'sd[a-z][1-9]')
			do
				mkdir -p /mnt/usbstorage

		MOUNT=`mount | grep -o '/mnt/usbstorage'`

		for i in $MOUNT

			do
				umount /mnt/usbstorage
			done 
		;;
esac
